0:
[OUTPUT]
    Name http
    Match kube.*
    Host {{ .Release.Name }}-victoria-logs-single-server
    port 9428
    compress gzip
    uri /insert/jsonline?_stream_fields=stream,kubernetes_pod_name&_msg_field=log&_time_field=date
    format json_lines
    json_date_format iso8601
    header AccountID 0
    header ProjectID 0

[FILTER]
    Name kubernetes
    Match kube.*
    Merge_Log On
    Keep_Log On
    K8S-Logging.Parser On
    K8S-Logging.Exclude On
[FILTER]
    Name                nest
    Match               *
    Wildcard            pod_name
    Operation lift
    Nested_under kubernetes
    Add_prefix   kubernetes_

- job_name: node-exporter
  honor_labels: true
  scrape_interval: 1m
  scrape_timeout: 10s
  metrics_path: /metrics
  scheme: http
  static_configs:
    - targets:
        - "10.5.0.10:9100"

auth:
  - user: scans
    group: scans
    uid: 568
    gid: 568
    password: scans
global:
  - "force user = scans"
  - "force group = scans"
  - "create mask = 0644"
  - "directory mask = 0755"
share:
  - name: Scans
    path: /share1
    browsable: yes
    readonly: no
    guestok: no
    comment: "Printer scans"
    veto: yes
